018package org.opengis.metadata.citation;
019
020import org.opengis.util.CodeList;
021import org.opengis.annotation.UML;
022import org.opengis.geoapi.internal.Vocabulary;
023
024import static org.opengis.annotation.Obligation.*;
025import static org.opengis.annotation.Specification.*;
026
027
028/**
029 * Identification of when a given event occurred
030 *
031 * @author  Martin Desruisseaux (IRD)
032 * @author  Rémi Maréchal (Geomatys)
033 * @version 3.1
034 * @since   2.0
035 */
036@Vocabulary(capacity=16)
037@UML(identifier="CI_DateTypeCode", specification=ISO_19115)
038public final class DateType extends CodeList<DateType> {
039    /**
040     * Serial number for compatibility with different versions.
041     */
042    private static final long serialVersionUID = 9031571038833329544L;
043
044    /**
045     * Date identifies when the resource was brought into existence.
046     */
047    @UML(identifier="creation", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
048    public static final DateType CREATION = new DateType("CREATION");
049
050    /**
051     * Date identifies when the resource was issued.
052     */
053    @UML(identifier="publication", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
054    public static final DateType PUBLICATION = new DateType("PUBLICATION");
055
056    /**
057     * Date identifies when the resource was examined or re-examined and improved or amended.
058     */
059    @UML(identifier="revision", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
060    public static final DateType REVISION = new DateType("REVISION");
061
062    /**
063     * Date identifies when resource expires.
064     *
065     * @since 3.1
066     */
067    @UML(identifier="expiry", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
068    public static final DateType EXPIRY = new DateType("EXPIRY");
069
070    /**
071     * Date identifies when resource was last updated.
072     *
073     * @since 3.1
074     */
075    @UML(identifier="lastUpdate", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
076    public static final DateType LAST_UPDATE = new DateType("LAST_UPDATE");
077
078    /**
079     * Date identifies when the resource was examined or re-examined and improved or amended.
080     *
081     * @since 3.1
082     */
083    @UML(identifier="lastRevision", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
084    public static final DateType LAST_REVISION = new DateType("LAST_REVISION");
085
086    /**
087     * Date identifies when the resource will be next updated.
088     *
089     * @since 3.1
090     */
091    @UML(identifier="nextUpdate", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
092    public static final DateType NEXT_UPDATE = new DateType("NEXT_UPDATE");
093
094    /**
095     * Date identifies when resource became not available or obtainable.
096     *
097     * @since 3.1
098     */
099    @UML(identifier="unavailable", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
100    public static final DateType UNAVAILABLE = new DateType("UNAVAILABLE");
101
102    /**
103     * Date identifies when resource became in force.
104     *
105     * @since 3.1
106     */
107    @UML(identifier="inForce", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
108    public static final DateType IN_FORCE = new DateType("IN_FORCE");
109
110    /**
111     * Date identifies when the resource was adopted.
112     *
113     * @since 3.1
114     */
115    @UML(identifier="adopted", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
116    public static final DateType ADOPTED = new DateType("ADOPTED");
117
118    /**
119     * Date identifies when the resource was deprecated.
120     *
121     * @since 3.1
122     */
123    @UML(identifier="deprecated", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
124    public static final DateType DEPRECATED = new DateType("DEPRECATED");
125
126    /**
127     * Date identifies when resource was superseded or replaced by another resource.
128     *
129     * @since 3.1
130     */
131    @UML(identifier="superseded", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
132    public static final DateType SUPERSEDED = new DateType("SUPERSEDED");
133
134    /**
135     * Time at which the data are considered to become valid.
136     *
137     * <div class="note"><b>Note:</b>
138     * there could be quite a delay between creation and validity begins.</div>
139     *
140     * @since 3.1
141     */
142    @UML(identifier="validityBegins", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
143    public static final DateType VALIDITY_BEGINS = new DateType("VALIDITY_BEGINS");
144
145    /**
146     * Time at which the data are no longer considered to be valid.
147     *
148     * @since 3.1
149     */
150    @UML(identifier="validityExpires", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
151    public static final DateType VALIDITY_EXPIRES = new DateType("VALIDITY_EXPIRES");
152
153    /**
154     * The date that the resource shall be released for public access.
155     *
156     * @since 3.1
157     */
158    @UML(identifier="released", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
159    public static final DateType RELEASED = new DateType("RELEASED");
160
161    /**
162     * Date identifies when an instance of the resource was distributed.
163     *
164     * @since 3.1
165     */
166    @UML(identifier="distribution", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
167    public static final DateType DISTRIBUTION = new DateType("DISTRIBUTION");
168
169    /**
170     * Constructs an element of the given name.
171     *
172     * @param name  the name of the new element. This name shall not be in use by another element of this type.
173     */
174    private DateType(final String name) {
175        super(name);
176    }
177
178    /**
179     * Returns the list of {@code DateType}s.
180     *
181     * @return the list of codes declared in the current JVM.
182     */
183    public static DateType[] values() {
184        return values(DateType.class);
185    }
186
187    /**
188     * Returns the list of codes of the same kind as this code list element.
189     * Invoking this method is equivalent to invoking {@link #values()}, except that
190     * this method can be invoked on an instance of the parent {@code CodeList} class.
191     *
192     * @return all code {@linkplain #values() values} for this code list.
193     */
194    @Override
195    public DateType[] family() {
196        return values();
197    }
198
199    /**
200     * Returns the date type that matches the given string, or returns a new one if none match it.
201     * This methods returns the first instance (in declaration order) for which the {@linkplain #name() name}
202     * is {@linkplain String#equalsIgnoreCase(String) equals, ignoring case}, to the given name.
203     * If no existing instance is found, then a new one is created for the given name.
204     *
205     * @param  code  the name of the code to fetch or to create.
206     * @return a code matching the given name.
207     */
208    public static DateType valueOf(String code) {
209        return valueOf(DateType.class, code, DateType::new).get();
210    }
211}
